items.text: good length on middle stump, spinning down the leg side but Mushfiqur taps it away. Would've been a wide if left alone
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: overpitched full and wide outside off, squeezed away towards the leg side rather unconvincingly. Tried to drive this square
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, spinning further away, cut off the back foot to deep point. Good effort from the fielder in the deep, parrying it back, but his feet have touched the ropes in his attempt. Boundary
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: tossed up full on middle stump, prods forward and turned towards the leg side
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up on off stump, shuffles across to the off side to get inside the line of the ball, and then smacks it over deep backward square. Quick to settle down on one knee, and sent into orbit
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs

items.text: flighted on leg stump, turned off his toes to short fine leg
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: tossed up on middle stump, driven with soft hands to mid off. Calls early for the quick run
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up full on off stump, big stride forward and defended towards short cover
items.shortText: Cremer to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, glances it fine past short third man. Work for the fielder, as he gives it a chase. Stops it from going for a four, though
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: full on off stump, slapped away from his body to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, the ball's angling into the right-hander, and he cuts late. Flies past the right of the keeper, and once again short third-man goes chasing behind it. Comes back for the second
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up full on off stump, tries to check his drive as th ball takes an inside edge towards the leg side
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: darted in full outside leg stump, goes down the leg side for extras. The keeper does well to get his body behind the ball
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

items.text: full on middle stump, mistimed his drive
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up on middle stump, lands up as a yorker, dug away to mid on
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Bothwell: "@Ralph, im reliably informed Williams has a bad behaviour record, as for Chris Mpofu i'm also as surprised as you.. Your guess is as good as mine. "
items.text: back of a length on middle stumps, goes deep into the crease and taps it back to Cremer
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, spins into him, turned off his hips to square leg
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length wide outside off, pokes at it and plays towards short third man
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, defended with soft hands
items.postText: Kamrul: "Don't remember the last time Bangladesh dominated Zimbabwe like today."
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Delwar Hossain: "There's not enough runs left in the innings for Tamim to get to his century. Bad luck."
items.text: full and wide outside off, slapped away from his body to cover. Misfield once again by the man there, allowing the ball to go through his legs. Four free runs. Jarvis the guilty man on this occasion
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on middle stump, goes deep into the crease and nudges this to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Cremer to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle and leg, flicked off his hips to square leg
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Sawan: "It might be a bit harsh on Sunjamul, But I want either of Abul/Saif to play against SL. They have a lot more offer both with bat and bowl."
items.text: short and wide outside off, tries to cut but not in the gap. Stopped by Raza at cover. But, oh dear, it's a big no ball.
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 no ball

items.text: can't put it away! Back of a length wide outside off, attempts a cut but plays under the delivery. Extra bounce this time
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, angling into the batsman, got big on him but does well to tap this off his chest towards the leg side
items.shortText: Muzarabani to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
